definition: (of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

sentences.english: Medically speaking seasickness is a variation of motion sickness or kinetosis.
sentences.chinese: 從醫學角度講，暈船是一種運動病。

sentences.english: These change are believed to be the important mechanism of how cinnarizine prevents motion sickness.
sentences.chinese: 這些變化可視爲腦益嗪抗運動病作用的重要機理。

sentences.english: Objective To determine the effect of Pinellia on motion sickness in rats.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究姜半夏對大鼠抗運動病作用的效果。

sentences.english: Medically speaking, sea sickness is a variation of motion sickness or kinetosis.
sentences.chinese: 從醫學角度來講，暈船是運動病或者暈動症的變異。

sentences.english: Several parameters of EGG were related to nausea in motion sickness.
sentences.chinese: 體表胃電圖的多個指標與運動病噁心綜合症有關。
